description:
Two-way data binding in AngularJS allows you to simply change a value in your JavaScript and your HTML immediately updates. Now imagine if you could change a value in your JavaScript and EVERY connected client's HTML would update. Come and learn how to be a real time cage dragon as we put together a realtime web application with AngularJS and Firebase.

Slides: http://goo.gl/HL3SJk
title: Be a Real Time Cage Dragon with AngularJS and Firebase
